Key Match Events: Caoimhín Kelleher gifted the ball to substitute Petros Mantalos in stoppage time to allow him to seal the win.
Tasos Bakasetas' deflected shot gave Greece the lead in the 48th minute.
Pre-Game Insights: Victory maintained the Greeks’ 100% start to the competition and kept them three points clear of England at the top of Group B2.
Post-Match Reflections: On an emotional night, the Georgios Karaiskakis Stadium fell silent before kick-off as both teams paid tribute to Greece defender George Baldock following his death at the age of 31.
